summary.para: Returns the size of the metadata content contained by the specified . The returned size accounts for the header and the length of the metadata.

param.name: pcbSize
param.para: A pointer that receives the size of the metadata content.

returns.para: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: pIStream
param.para: The content stream in which to match a metadata format.

param.para: A pointer that receives a metadata format GUID for the given parameters.

returns.para: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
